com.cyc.base.kbtool

Interface UnassertTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CycUnassertTool

    public interface UnassertTool
    Tools for unasserting facts from the Cyc KB. To assert facts to the Cyc KB, use the AssertTool. To perform simple tasks, like renaming constants, use the ObjectTool.
    See Also:
    AssertTool, ObjectTool

    • Method Detail

      • kill

        void kill(CycConstant[] cycConstants)
          throws CycConnectionException,
                 CycConnectionException,
                 CycApiException
        Kills the given Cyc constants. If CYCCONSTANT is a microtheory, then all the contained assertions are deleted from the KB, the Cyc Truth Maintenance System (TMS) will automatically delete any derived assertions whose sole support is the killed term(s).
        Parameters:
        cycConstants - the list of constant terms to be removed from the KB
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • kill

        void kill(Fort cycFort)
          throws CycConnectionException,
                 CycConnectionException,
                 CycApiException
        Kills a reified Cyc term. If CYCFORT is a microtheory, then all the contained assertions are deleted from the KB, the Cyc Truth Maintenance System (TMS) will automatically delete any derived assertions whose sole support is the killed term(s).
        Parameters:
        cycFort - the NART term to be removed from the KB
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • killWithoutTranscript

        void killWithoutTranscript(CycConstant cycConstant)
                           throws CycConnectionException,
                                  CycConnectionException,
                                  CycApiException
        Kills a Cyc constant without issuing a transcript operation. If CYCCONSTANT is a microtheory, then all the contained assertions are deleted from the KB, the Cyc Truth Maintenance System (TMS) will automatically delete any derived assertions whose sole support is the killed term(s).
        Parameters:
        cycConstant - the constant term to be removed from the KB
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • blastAssertion

        @Deprecated
void blastAssertion(CycAssertion assertion,
                             boolean bookkeeping,
                             boolean transcript)
                    throws CycConnectionException,
                           CycConnectionException,
                           CycApiException
        Deprecated. Forcing the deletion of an assertion from the KB may have unintended consequences, and should be used with extreme caution.
        Forcefully delete the assertion. Note that this may have unintended side effects, since it may break bits of the truth-maintenance structure that maintains KB integrity. For example, even though an assertion has been blasted, it could still be re-derived, and blasting it will have no effect on whether or not it will be re-derived. Extreme caution should be exercised with this method. With great power comes great responsibility.
        Parameters:
        assertion - the assertion in the form of a CycAssertion
        bookkeeping -
        transcript -
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • unassertGaf

        void unassertGaf(CycList gaf,
               CycObject mt)
                 throws CycConnectionException,
                        CycConnectionException,
                        CycApiException
        Unasserts the given ground atomic formula (gaf) in the specified microtheory MT.
        Parameters:
        gaf - the gaf in the form of a CycList
        mt - the microtheory in which the assertion is made
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error

      • unassertMatchingAssertionsWithoutTranscript

        void unassertMatchingAssertionsWithoutTranscript(Fort predicate,
                                               Object arg1,
                                               CycObject mt)
                                                 throws CycConnectionException,
                                                        CycConnectionException,
                                                        CycApiException
        Unasserts all assertions from the given mt having the given predicate and arg1, without a transcript record of the unassert operation.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the given predicate or null to match all predicates
        arg1 - the given arg1
        mt - the microtheory from which to delete the matched assertions
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

      • unassertMtContentsWithTranscript

        void unassertMtContentsWithTranscript(CycObject mt)
                                      throws CycConnectionException,
                                             CycConnectionException,
                                             CycApiException
        Unasserts all assertions from the given mt, with a transcript record of the unassert operation.
        Parameters:
        mt - the microtheory from which to delete all its assertions
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if a communications error occurs
        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

      • unassertMtContentsWithoutTranscript

                                         throws CycConnectionException,
                                                CycConnectionException,
                                                CycApiException

        CycConnectionException - if the Cyc server cannot be found
        CycApiException - if the Cyc server returns an error

                                               CycObject mt)
                                                 throws CycConnectionException,
                                                        CycConnectionException,
                                                        CycApiException
        Unasserts the given sentence with bookkeeping and without placing it on the transcript queue.
        Parameters:
        sentence - the given sentence for unassertion
        mt - the microtheory from which the assertion is removed
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network
        CycConnectionException - if a data communication error occurs
